attributes.action: Have a named person to help in every PCT to help Adults with Autism/Aspergers
attributes.additional_details:
In some counties there are many services to help children and teenagers deal with Autism or Aspergers. Howerver when you turn 18 there is very little surport and that is is given to the least functioning or ones who have co diagnoses eg depression and even that finishes when they are cured of it.
What I propse is that the is one named person (at least) who is able to do training with that person and give advice to other people who work with them or are carers.
